content: in 1x1 rib for 5 rounds bind off using italian bind off 3 repeat for the left arm hole 4 pick up all st starting from the bottom of the right yoke moving up to the neck and going all the way around to the bottom of the left yoke knit 1x1 rib for 6 rounds keeping in mind 4 button st placed evenly on the right side s straight edge 5 sew in desired buttons on the left front aligning them with the holes
